table.name: administrative_source_type
table.remarks: Code list of administrative source types. Used by SOLA to identify document types. Implementation of the LADM LA_AdministrativeSourceType class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the administrative source type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the administrative source type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the administrative source type

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the administrative source type.

column.name: is_for_registration
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Flag that identifies whether documents of this type must be formally registered in SOLA before they can be used in rights registration. E.g. Power of Attorney documents must be registered in SOLA before they can be associated with transfer transactions, etc.

table.name: archive
table.remarks: Represents an archive where collections of physical documents may be kept such as a filing cabinet, library or storage unit. May also refer to digital archives if applicable. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the archive.

column.name: name
column.remarks: Description of the archive and/or it's location.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the archive_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: availability_status_type
table.remarks: Code list of availability status types. Indicates if a document is available, archived, destroyed or incomplete. Implementation of the LADM LA_AvailabilityStatusType class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the availability status type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the availability status type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the availability status type

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the availability status type.

table.name: power_of_attorney
table.remarks: An extension of the soure.source table that captures details for power of attorney documents. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: Identifier for the power of attorney record. Matches the source identifier for the power of attorney record.

column.name: person_name
column.remarks: The name of the person that is granting the power of attorney (a.k.a. grantor).

column.name: attorney_name
column.remarks: The name of the person that will act on behalf of the grantor as their attorney.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the power_of_attorney_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: presentation_form_type
table.remarks: Code list of presentation form types. Indicates the original format of the document when presented to the land office (e.g. Hardcopy, digital, image, video, etc). Implementation of the LADM CI_PresentationFormCode class. Tags: Reference Table, LADM Reference Object

column.name: code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code for the presentation form type.

column.name: display_value
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Displayed value of the presentation form type.

column.name: status
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status of the presentation form type

column.name: description
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Description of the presentation form type.

table.name: Sequence: source_la_nr_seq
table.remarks: Sequence number used as the basis for the Source nr field. This sequence is used by the generate-source-nr business rule.

table.name: source
table.remarks: Represents metadata about documents or recognised facts that provide the basis for the recording of a registration, cadastre change, right, responsibility or administrative action by the land office. Implementation of the LADM LA_Source class. Tags: LADM Reference Object, Change History

column.name: id
column.remarks: LADM Definition: Source identifier.

column.name: maintype
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The type of the representation of the content of the source.

column.name: la_nr
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Reference number or identifier assigned to the document by the land office.

column.name: reference_nr
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Reference number or identifier assigned to the document by an external agency.

column.name: archive_id
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Archive identifier for the source.

column.name: acceptance
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The date of force of law of the source by an authority.

column.name: recordation
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The date of formalization by the source agency.

column.name: submission
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The date of submission of the source by a party.

column.name: expiration_date
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date the document expires and is no longer enforceable.

column.name: ext_archive_id
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Identifier of the source in an external document management system. Used by SOLA to reference the digital copy of the document in the document table.

column.name: availability_status_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The code describing the availability status of the document.

column.name: type_code
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The type of document.

column.name: content
column.remarks: LADM Definition: The content of the source. Not used by SOLA as digital copies of documents are stored in the document table.

column.name: status_code
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Status (pending, current, historic) of the source. Only used for transactioned documents such as power of attorney.

column.name: transaction_id
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: Reference to the transaction used to register the document in SOLA. Only used for transactioned documents such as power of attorney.

column.name: owner_name
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The name of the firm or bank that created the document (a.k.a. Source Agency).

column.name: version
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The document version.

column.name: signing_date
column.remarks: SOLA Extension: The date the document was signed by all parties.

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the source_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

column.name: classification_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The security classification for this Source. Only users with the security classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record. If null, the record is considered unrestricted.

column.name: redact_code
column.remarks: FROM SOLA State Land Extension: The redact classification for this Source. Only users with the redact classification (or a higher classification) will be able to view the record with un-redacted fields. If null, the record is considered unrestricted and no redaction to the record will occur unless bulk redaction classifications have been set for fields of the record.

table.name: spatial_source
table.remarks: A spatial source may be the final (sometimes formal) documents, or all documents related to a survey. Sometimes serveral documents are the result of a single survey. A spatial source may be official or not (i.e. a registered survey plan or an aerial photograph). Implementation of the LADM LA_Source class. Not used by SOLA. column.name: type_code

column.name: rowversion

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.

table.name: Trigger Function: f_for_tbl_source_trg_change_of_status
table.remarks: Function triggered on update of the source table that updates the status of any previous version of a source record to Previous when the new source record receives a Current or Historic status.
